rules.description: Tab as Hyper when hold, Tab when tapped
Hyper Key Main Layer - App Runner and Arrow to Window Organizer

manipulators.description: Hyper W to Toggle Work Macro
T to Open Terminal in Current Folder
O to Open VS Code in Current Folder

rules.description: Hyper Key Sub Layer Q - Window Organize
Hyper Key Sub Layer J - Text Edit

manipulators.description: Toggle On Hyper Sub Layer J
K to Toggle Off Hyper Sub Layer J
Command to Toggle On Hyper Sub Layer J
Command to Toggle Off Hyper Sub Layer J

rules.description: Disable Hyper + . , / to prevent system diagnostic
Right Shift + Left Shift to select words
Mouse button4 to back, Mouse button5 to forward
